0bf9e044-cc2a-4afc-95ef-54efcee39810 Gather the ingredients.
0bf9e044-cc2a-4afc-95ef-54efcee39810 Soak the skewers in water while you marinate the beef.
0bf9e044-cc2a-4afc-95ef-54efcee39810 Slice the sirloin into thin strips and place them into a medium-sized bowl with the marinade mixture. Stir to coat the meat well. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours.
0bf9e044-cc2a-4afc-95ef-54efcee39810 Meanwhile, make the satay sauce. Add the peanut butter to a small pot over a medium heat. Stir it until it melts. Add the red curry paste and stir well to combine.
0bf9e044-cc2a-4afc-95ef-54efcee39810 Add the coconut milk to the pot and keep stirring. Turn the heat down low and add the sugar and fish sauce. Stir well.
0bf9e044-cc2a-4afc-95ef-54efcee39810 Once the sauce thickens add the chicken stock or water and stir to combine. Turn the heat off and set the pot aside.
0bf9e044-cc2a-4afc-95ef-54efcee39810 Skewer the beef. Reserve the marinade and set aside.
0bf9e044-cc2a-4afc-95ef-54efcee39810 If you are using a barbecue to cook the satay then heat it to a medium-high heat. If you are frying the satay, then heat 1/2 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a griddle or fry pan over a medium-high heat.
0bf9e044-cc2a-4afc-95ef-54efcee39810 Cook the skewers about 5 minutes, turning and brushing with marinade mixture until cooked.
0bf9e044-cc2a-4afc-95ef-54efcee39810 Meanwhile, when you are on to cooking your last few skewers, return the satay sauce pot to the stove and heat it up. Stir the sauce well and then serve in a small bowl.
0bf9e044-cc2a-4afc-95ef-54efcee39810 Arrange beef satay on a serving plate and serve with a side of satay sauce for dipping. Serve shallots and cucumber in a small, separate serving bowl. They are eaten as an accompaniment to the beef.
9b150a40-cba8-438a-846d-0715daedc611 Gather the ingredients.
9b150a40-cba8-438a-846d-0715daedc611 Prepare the aioli by combining the garlic, cilantro, mayonnaise and lemon juice in a bowl. Stir well to combine then cover and set aside until serving time.
9b150a40-cba8-438a-846d-0715daedc611 Rinse whitebait under cold, running water and gently pat dry with paper towels.
9b150a40-cba8-438a-846d-0715daedc611 Place flour and sea salt in a bowl and mix well.
9b150a40-cba8-438a-846d-0715daedc611 Heat oil in a large saucepan until surface begins to shimmer. Test to see if the oil is ready by dropping a pinch of flour into it. The flour should fry immediately.
9b150a40-cba8-438a-846d-0715daedc611 Toss fish in seasoned flour, ensuring they are well coated. Remove and shake off excess flour, then deep-fry in batches for 40 seconds or until crisp and golden.
9b150a40-cba8-438a-846d-0715daedc611 Serve whitebait with a sprinkle of sea salt and aioli.
503de5ae-fbba-479d-aa7a-78ffee389af1 Heat a small, heavy-based saucepan over medium heat. Add the sugar and macadamia nuts to the pan and stir.
503de5ae-fbba-479d-aa7a-78ffee389af1 Continuing stirring gently until the sugar has melted and the macadamia nuts have caramelized.
503de5ae-fbba-479d-aa7a-78ffee389af1 Carefully transfer nuts onto waxed paper. Allow to cool and then break into pieces. When completely cool, store in a tightly covered container.
08201fd7-9370-410c-8352-72a49efe40d7 Heat the oven to 375 F (190 C).
08201fd7-9370-410c-8352-72a49efe40d7 Pat the chicken dry. Place lemon halves and bay leaves in the chicken cavity. Tie the legs together with kitchen string.
08201fd7-9370-410c-8352-72a49efe40d7 In a small bowl, mix together the olive oil, rosemary, and salt. Rub mixture over the entire chicken.
08201fd7-9370-410c-8352-72a49efe40d7 Place the chicken in a large baking dish. Set aside.
08201fd7-9370-410c-8352-72a49efe40d7 Bring the chicken stock, white wine and garlic cloves to a simmer in a medium saucepan. Pour the liquid and garlic cloves into the baking dish around the chicken. Cover baking dish with foil, crimping the edges tightly around the dish so that no steam can escape. Roast for 1 hour 20 minutes.
08201fd7-9370-410c-8352-72a49efe40d7 After this time, remove chicken from oven and remove the foil. Place chicken back in the oven, and roast for another 20 minutes or until the chicken is golden brown.
08201fd7-9370-410c-8352-72a49efe40d7 Remove chicken from the oven and loosely cover it in tinfoil. Let it rest for about 15 minutes.
08201fd7-9370-410c-8352-72a49efe40d7 Spoon the sauce from the baking dish into a saucepan, and keep it warm. You can strain some of the garlic cloves into the sauce, or just keep the cloves whole.
08201fd7-9370-410c-8352-72a49efe40d7 Serve chicken with garlic sauce on the side. Place a few garlic cloves on each plate so that guests can squeeze garlic onto the chicken if they wish.
9fe88bdd-9f6d-4964-8f00-e9a56e7c941b Gather the ingredients. Preheat oven to 350 F/180 C. Place a baking tray in the oven.
9fe88bdd-9f6d-4964-8f00-e9a56e7c941b To make the pastry shell, use pastry to line the base and side of a fluted flan tin. Gently press the pastry up against the sides, making sure there are no air bubbles. Trim to fit and prick the base with a fork. Place in the freezer for 15 minutes or until firm.
9fe88bdd-9f6d-4964-8f00-e9a56e7c941b Line the pastry with foil and add baking beads or uncooked rice to blind bake. Place the tin on the preheated baking tray in the oven and bake for 10 to 15 minutes or until golden. Remove from the oven.
9fe88bdd-9f6d-4964-8f00-e9a56e7c941b Carefully remove the foil and baking beads and set the pastry shell aside to cool.
9fe88bdd-9f6d-4964-8f00-e9a56e7c941b Spread out the vegetables in a large baking dish. Coat well in oil and season with salt and pepper.
9fe88bdd-9f6d-4964-8f00-e9a56e7c941b Roast in the oven for about 25 to 30 minutes until very slightly charred. Set aside and cool slightly, separating the onion layers.
9fe88bdd-9f6d-4964-8f00-e9a56e7c941b In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs with the milk and cream. Stir in the cheeses, parsley, and salt. Transfer egg mixture to a jug.
9fe88bdd-9f6d-4964-8f00-e9a56e7c941b Spread the roasted vegetables over the bottom of the pastry shell (which is still on the baking tray to catch any drips during baking). Carefully pour the egg mixture over top. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until just set.
9fe88bdd-9f6d-4964-8f00-e9a56e7c941b Let cool for a few minutes and serve warm or at room temperature.
9e16c4a0-1dd5-4102-85da-ca186019607a Gather the ingredients.
9e16c4a0-1dd5-4102-85da-ca186019607a Heat the oven to 350 F. Cut the white and sweet potatoes into 1-inch-thick slices.
9e16c4a0-1dd5-4102-85da-ca186019607a Cut the onions in half and then place all of the vegetables in a roasting pan in one even layer.
9e16c4a0-1dd5-4102-85da-ca186019607a Drizzle the vegetables with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil.
9e16c4a0-1dd5-4102-85da-ca186019607a Sprinkle with 1 teaspoon salt and toss to combine.
9e16c4a0-1dd5-4102-85da-ca186019607a Place the lamb on top of the vegetables and rub the lamb with the remaining 2 tablespoons olive oil.
9e16c4a0-1dd5-4102-85da-ca186019607a Sprinkle the lamb with the rest of the sea salt.
9e16c4a0-1dd5-4102-85da-ca186019607a Use the point of a sharp knife to make small incisions all over the lamb.
9e16c4a0-1dd5-4102-85da-ca186019607a Place the garlic slivers and rosemary springs in the slits.
9e16c4a0-1dd5-4102-85da-ca186019607a Place the roasting pan on the middle oven rack and roast for 1 1/2 hours, or until a meat thermometer placed in the thickest part of the lamb reads 140 F for rare, 160 F for medium, and 170 F for well done.
9e16c4a0-1dd5-4102-85da-ca186019607a Remove from the oven and transfer the lamb to a plate to rest.
9e16c4a0-1dd5-4102-85da-ca186019607a Cover the lamb with aluminum foil and let it sit for 10 minutes.
9e16c4a0-1dd5-4102-85da-ca186019607a Serve the lamb with the roasted potatoes and onions, and mint sauce on the side.
38f8e0f3-d834-4730-afc0-46a116dd0b70 In a large bowl mix together the ground kangaroo meat, egg, bread crumbs, chopped onion, 1 tablespoon chopped parsley and the oregano. Form into 4 burgers. Season with salt and pepper.
38f8e0f3-d834-4730-afc0-46a116dd0b70 In a small bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons chopped parsley and garlic clove.
38f8e0f3-d834-4730-afc0-46a116dd0b70 Heat grill to high. Put the burgers on the grill. Because the meat is so lean (only 2% fat), they won't take long to cook, and like most game meats, you don't want to over-cook them. Flip the burgers every 2 minutes to ensure even cooking. Depending on the thickness you've made them, the burgers will be done in 6 to 8 minutes.
38f8e0f3-d834-4730-afc0-46a116dd0b70 While the burgers are cooking, grill one side of the onion slices until grill marks appear. Flip the onion slices and top each with a piece of Camembert. Spread some of the mayonnaise on each bun. Put a burger on the bottom half of the bun. Top each burger with a Camembert-onion slice, and then the top half of the bun.
11fe85e2-0e79-4968-a2f9-d40d4899ec46 Combine the marinade ingredients together in a large, non-reactive bowl. Add the lamb backstraps, and mix well to coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or up to 24 hours.
11fe85e2-0e79-4968-a2f9-d40d4899ec46 Prepare the cucumber yogurt just before cooking the lamb. Combine yogurt, cucumber, mint, lemon juice, and salt together in a small bowl. Stir well, and set aside.
11fe85e2-0e79-4968-a2f9-d40d4899ec46 Heat grill or barbecue on a high heat. Cook lamb backstraps on all sides until medium rare - about 8 to 10 minutes.
11fe85e2-0e79-4968-a2f9-d40d4899ec46 Transfer lamb to a plate and cover loosely with foil for 5 minutes. After this time slice the lamb diagonally and then serve with cucumber yogurt and two lemon wedges.
51df22b4-70e3-4af1-a1e3-2abd320e345e Boil some water in a large pot for the pasta. Cook the pasta according to packet instructions and have it ready around the same time as the clams or just a bit before.
51df22b4-70e3-4af1-a1e3-2abd320e345e Soak the clams in a bowl of cold water for about 10 minutes. Drain and rinse under cold running water.
51df22b4-70e3-4af1-a1e3-2abd320e345e Heat the oil and butter over medium heat in a large, heavy-based pot. Add the onion and fry for 2 to 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, until translucent. Add the garlic, chili flakes and salt and stir for about 20 seconds.
51df22b4-70e3-4af1-a1e3-2abd320e345e Add the chopped tomatoes and fry for about 7 minutes until their juice starts to evaporate.
51df22b4-70e3-4af1-a1e3-2abd320e345e Turn the heat up to medium-high and add the clams to the pot. Cover with a lid. After about 2 to 3 minutes add the wine to the pot. Cover again and shake the pot from side to side.
51df22b4-70e3-4af1-a1e3-2abd320e345e Cook the clams for a further 5 minutes or until they open. Add the parsley and stir with a wooden spoon. Cover and shake pot again.
51df22b4-70e3-4af1-a1e3-2abd320e345e Drain the pasta and then pour the clam mixture on top. Stir well and serve immediately.
b40419dd-1283-4d8e-8d40-4d7c4f4e1294 Gather the ingredients.
b40419dd-1283-4d8e-8d40-4d7c4f4e1294 Prepare the marinade by grinding the garlic, mint, cumin, salt, and paprika with a mortar and pestle. Alternatively, you can use a food processor. Grind ingredients into a paste and then add the olive oil and lemon juice. Mix well.
b40419dd-1283-4d8e-8d40-4d7c4f4e1294 Make little incisions in the lamb and then coat it well with the marinade. Make sure you coat the inside and outside of the lamb thoroughly.
b40419dd-1283-4d8e-8d40-4d7c4f4e1294 Place lamb in a bowl and cover. Place it in the fridge for at least 2 hours or even overnight.
b40419dd-1283-4d8e-8d40-4d7c4f4e1294 Remove the lamb from the fridge 1 hour prior to cooking. Preheat the oven to 350 F.
b40419dd-1283-4d8e-8d40-4d7c4f4e1294 Place the lamb in a baking dish and roast for 1 hour and 20 minutes for pink meat. Roast the lamb for an extra 20 minutes for medium to well-done meat.
b40419dd-1283-4d8e-8d40-4d7c4f4e1294 Meanwhile, prepare the cucumber sauce. Mix together the yogurt, cucumber, garlic, lemon juice, mint, and cilantro. Add the salt and mix well. Set aside.
b40419dd-1283-4d8e-8d40-4d7c4f4e1294 Prepare the couscous about 20 minutes before serving the lamb. Bring the vegetable stock to a boil in a small pot. Remove the pot from the heat and add the couscous. Cover and let it sit for about 5 minutes. Transfer to a serving bowl.
b40419dd-1283-4d8e-8d40-4d7c4f4e1294 Add 1 tablespoon of olive oil to the couscous. Stir well with a fork. Add the curry powder and stir again. Next, add a pinch of salt.
b40419dd-1283-4d8e-8d40-4d7c4f4e1294 Add the raisins and pine nuts to the couscous and stir with the fork.
b40419dd-1283-4d8e-8d40-4d7c4f4e1294 Remove the lamb when ready and slice it. Spoon some of the liquid from the pan onto the lamb. Serve on a bed of couscous and spoon the yogurt sauce on top.
79d4ebf9-46ee-4193-92ee-2ca2807a19b4 Place the potatoes in a large, heavy saucepan. Add enough cold water to fully cover the potatoes. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, partially covered, until potatoes are tender; about 10 to 15 minutes.
79d4ebf9-46ee-4193-92ee-2ca2807a19b4 Drain the potatoes in a colander, then return to pan and add the milk, butter, and salt.
79d4ebf9-46ee-4193-92ee-2ca2807a19b4 Use an electric mixer to beat the potatoes until smooth and creamy. Alternatively, cream using a potato masher. Set aside to cool.
79d4ebf9-46ee-4193-92ee-2ca2807a19b4 To make the beef filling, heat the oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the onion and fry for 3 to 4 minutes or until soft and translucent.
79d4ebf9-46ee-4193-92ee-2ca2807a19b4 Add ground beef and cook for 3 to 4 minutes, stirring and breaking up with a wooden spoon until browned.
79d4ebf9-46ee-4193-92ee-2ca2807a19b4 In a separate bowl, combine cornstarch and 1 tablespoon of beef stock and stir well. Set aside.
79d4ebf9-46ee-4193-92ee-2ca2807a19b4 Add remaining beef stock, tomato paste, Worcestershire sauce, and Vegemite to beef. Stir well to combine. Add cornstarch mixture and stir. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes or until thick. Remove from heat and cool.
79d4ebf9-46ee-4193-92ee-2ca2807a19b4 Preheat oven to 425 F / 220 C.
79d4ebf9-46ee-4193-92ee-2ca2807a19b4 Place pie tin, face-down, on the first pastry sheet and cut a circle that's slightly larger than the tin (about 1/2 inch bigger)this is the pie base. Repeat process to make another 3 bases.
79d4ebf9-46ee-4193-92ee-2ca2807a19b4 Press base pastry into pie tins and gently press pastry up the sides. Fill with meat mixture. Brush rims with water.
79d4ebf9-46ee-4193-92ee-2ca2807a19b4 Spoon mashed potato into a piping bag fitted with a nozzle and squeeze potato topping in a pinwheel motion on each pie to cover the meat filling.
79d4ebf9-46ee-4193-92ee-2ca2807a19b4 Place pies on a baking tray and bake for 20 minutes or until the potato filling is slightly golden. Serve with ketchup or mushy peas with additional gravy.
bd516301-128f-428a-a5fa-1cd7448610cd Preheat the oven to 350F.
bd516301-128f-428a-a5fa-1cd7448610cd Lightly butter an 8 inch square cake tin. Set aside.
bd516301-128f-428a-a5fa-1cd7448610cd In a large bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Set aside.
bd516301-128f-428a-a5fa-1cd7448610cd In a separate bowl, use an electric beater to cream the butter and sugar mixture together until pale and fluffy.
bd516301-128f-428a-a5fa-1cd7448610cd Add the eggs one at a time to the butter/sugar mixture. Beat well after adding each egg.
bd516301-128f-428a-a5fa-1cd7448610cd Add the vanilla to the mixture and mix well to combine.
bd516301-128f-428a-a5fa-1cd7448610cd Next, use a spatula to alternately add the flour mixture and milk, in three additions, starting and finishing with the flour.
bd516301-128f-428a-a5fa-1cd7448610cd Spread the batter into the cake tin, making sure it's evenly spread.
bd516301-128f-428a-a5fa-1cd7448610cd Bake in the oven for about 30 minutes. Test the center of the cake with a toothpick and make sure it comes out clean.
bd516301-128f-428a-a5fa-1cd7448610cd Cool the cake in the tin for about five minutes and then invert it onto a wire rack to cool.
bd516301-128f-428a-a5fa-1cd7448610cd Once the cake has cooled cut it into squares of the desired size and place them in an airtight container. Pop the container in the fridge for at least two hours or even overnight.
bd516301-128f-428a-a5fa-1cd7448610cd Now for the icing. Place the icing sugar, cocoa powder, butter and milk in a heatproof bowl over a saucepan of simmering water.
bd516301-128f-428a-a5fa-1cd7448610cd Stir the mixture until it is smooth but still a bit thick. You don't want the liquid to get too thin otherwise the sponge cake won't absorb the coating.
bd516301-128f-428a-a5fa-1cd7448610cd Now it's time to assemble the Lamingtons. Put out some newspaper under wire racks to catch any mess. Place the cake pieces on the racks and have your chocolate icing and desiccated coconut ready.
bd516301-128f-428a-a5fa-1cd7448610cd Quickly coat the sponge cake on all sides in the icing mixture and then gently roll the cake in the coconut. Repeat the process.
bd516301-128f-428a-a5fa-1cd7448610cd The Lamingtons can be stored in an airtight container for five days.
557f45ea-efa3-4125-8255-eec05928321c Gather the ingredients.
557f45ea-efa3-4125-8255-eec05928321c Add 2 tablespoon whipping cream and chocolate to a clean metal bowl. Place bowl on top of a saucepan filled with enough water to simmer for several minutes. Make sure the water doesn't touch the bowl.
557f45ea-efa3-4125-8255-eec05928321c Heat gently and stir the chocolate cream mixture with a metal spoon until the chocolate is melted and smooth.
557f45ea-efa3-4125-8255-eec05928321c Remove the chocolate mixture from the stove to cool just slightly. Add the egg yolk to the chocolate mixture while stirring until combined and smooth. The residual heat from the chocolate will cook the egg yolk. Place the bowl over the saucepan filled with hot water to keep the chocolate warm but don't turn the heat back on.
557f45ea-efa3-4125-8255-eec05928321c Whip the whipping cream until soft peaks form. Add half of the melted chocolate to the whipped cream with the metal spoon and fold until just combined. Fold in the remaining chocolate mixture but be careful not to over mix or deflate the volume. Set aside.
557f45ea-efa3-4125-8255-eec05928321c Use a clean electric mixer to beat the egg white until soft peaks form and then fold it into the chocolate mousse mixture. Spoon mousse into serving glasses. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours.
557f45ea-efa3-4125-8255-eec05928321c Serve with chocolate shavings or fresh raspberries.
557f45ea-efa3-4125-8255-eec05928321c Enjoy!
2f90cbc1-2bbf-4325-8aac-400814efc962 Gather the ingredients.
2f90cbc1-2bbf-4325-8aac-400814efc962 Preheat the oven to 350 F/180 C. Grease an 8- by 4-inch loaf pan with a little butter. Set aside.
2f90cbc1-2bbf-4325-8aac-400814efc962 In a mixing bowl, beat the butter and sugar with an electric mixer until pale and fluffy. Add eggs one at a time beating well after each addition.
2f90cbc1-2bbf-4325-8aac-400814efc962 Use a metal spoon to fold in the mashed bananas and yogurt.
2f90cbc1-2bbf-4325-8aac-400814efc962 Sift together the flour and baking powder, then fold gently into the banana/yogurt mixture until just combined. Don't over mix.
2f90cbc1-2bbf-4325-8aac-400814efc962 Spoon the mixture into the greased pan and bake for 50 to 60 minutes or until a skewer inserted into the middle of the cake comes out clean.
2f90cbc1-2bbf-4325-8aac-400814efc962 Remove cake from the oven and allow it to stand for 5 minutes in the pan. Then gently turn the cake out of the tin and cool on a wire rack.
2f90cbc1-2bbf-4325-8aac-400814efc962 Serve and enjoy!
a04503b2-4611-4bd5-a2d0-b2f1c5b48df7 Heat oven to 150C/300F.
a04503b2-4611-4bd5-a2d0-b2f1c5b48df7 Lightly grease an 11-inch x 7-inch rectangular cake tin. Line tin with baking paper and allow the paper to hang over the edges a little to facilitate the cakes removal once its baked.
a04503b2-4611-4bd5-a2d0-b2f1c5b48df7 To make the cake: In a mixing bowl cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add three egg yolks, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
a04503b2-4611-4bd5-a2d0-b2f1c5b48df7 Sift flour and baking powder together. Fold into the creamed butter-sugar mixture. The dough will seem quite crumbly, but this is normal. Press dough into the bottom of the lined cake tin.
a04503b2-4611-4bd5-a2d0-b2f1c5b48df7 To make the coconut-meringue topping: In a clean bowl, use an electric mixer to beat the three egg whites until they form soft peaks.
a04503b2-4611-4bd5-a2d0-b2f1c5b48df7 Gradually add 1/4 cup castor sugar, one tablespoon at a time, while continuing to beat the whites until they form stiff, glossy peaks. Use a spatula to gently fold in the desiccated coconut and vanilla essence (extract).
a04503b2-4611-4bd5-a2d0-b2f1c5b48df7 Using a spatula, spread a thin layer of jam over the dough in the pan.
a04503b2-4611-4bd5-a2d0-b2f1c5b48df7 Next, spoon and spread the coconut meringue over the jam, making sure the meringue completely covers the jam.
a04503b2-4611-4bd5-a2d0-b2f1c5b48df7 Bake for 20 to 25 minutes or until the meringue top is a soft pink eggshell color. It is normal for the meringue to crack, so don't panic.
a04503b2-4611-4bd5-a2d0-b2f1c5b48df7 Remove from the oven and cool in tin for two to three minutes. Carefully remove the cake from the tin by holding onto the baking paper and gently lifting. Cool on a wire rack.
a04503b2-4611-4bd5-a2d0-b2f1c5b48df7 Once cooled, cut cake into squares and serve topped with fresh raspberries, if desired. The Louise Cake can be kept in an airtight container for up to one week.
39e376e4-094e-4cc5-8fd6-9f32ebdc378b Gather the ingredients.
39e376e4-094e-4cc5-8fd6-9f32ebdc378b Preheat the oven to 350 F/180 C. Line a baking sheet with baking paper. Set aside.
39e376e4-094e-4cc5-8fd6-9f32ebdc378b Cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
39e376e4-094e-4cc5-8fd6-9f32ebdc378b Sift together the flour and cocoa powder and mix into butter mixture with a wooden spoon.
39e376e4-094e-4cc5-8fd6-9f32ebdc378b Fold in cornflakes and don't worry if they crumble.
39e376e4-094e-4cc5-8fd6-9f32ebdc378b Roll or press 1 1/2 teaspoons of the dough into balls and flatten them slightly. Place them about 2 inches apart on the baking sheet.
39e376e4-094e-4cc5-8fd6-9f32ebdc378b Bake in the oven for 10 to 15 minutes. Remove from oven, and cool on a wire rack.
39e376e4-094e-4cc5-8fd6-9f32ebdc378b Prepare the icing by combining the icing sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, and water in a bowl.
39e376e4-094e-4cc5-8fd6-9f32ebdc378b Mix well until the mixture is free of lumps and of a creamy consistency.
39e376e4-094e-4cc5-8fd6-9f32ebdc378b Spoon a little icing on each cookie, and decorate with flaked almonds.
1d674661-8c86-48e7-b26d-1ee6ecf5ba4d Preheat oven to 400 F. Line a shallow jelly roll pan with parchment paper.
1d674661-8c86-48e7-b26d-1ee6ecf5ba4d Sprinkle cream of tartar over egg whites and beat until stiff. Whisk together sugar and cornstarch. Add the mixture to the egg whites a tablespoon at a time while beating on medium speed until all is combined. The meringue should be shiny, white, and stiff. Fold in vanilla extract.
1d674661-8c86-48e7-b26d-1ee6ecf5ba4d Reduce oven heat to 200 F. Mound the meringue on the pan in a round shape about 6 inches in diameter. Bake for 1 hour. Turn off oven, leaving meringue in oven until it is cold, or overnight.
1d674661-8c86-48e7-b26d-1ee6ecf5ba4d Arrange fruit over the base of the pavlova meringue, top with whipped cream and sprinkle with chips, crushed or small candies and/or additional fruit.
1d674661-8c86-48e7-b26d-1ee6ecf5ba4d Use a serrated knife to gently saw slices. Store leftovers in a covered container.
cc2fc6c1-bf9d-461d-8680-5580e6ba82df Gather the ingredients.
cc2fc6c1-bf9d-461d-8680-5580e6ba82df Line a baking tray with waxed parchment paper. Set aside
cc2fc6c1-bf9d-461d-8680-5580e6ba82df Heat the 5 tablespoons of sugar and 2 tablespoons golden syrup or light corn syrup in a small saucepan over medium heat.
cc2fc6c1-bf9d-461d-8680-5580e6ba82df Melt the mixture and stir occasionally. Bring to a boil for 5 or 6 minutesmake sure you stir continuously so the syrup doesn't burn.
cc2fc6c1-bf9d-461d-8680-5580e6ba82df Take the pot off the stove and stir in the baking soda (bicarbonate of soda). The mixture will froth up and become pale. Use a spatula to scrape and pour the mixture onto the waxed parchment paper.
cc2fc6c1-bf9d-461d-8680-5580e6ba82df Allow the honeycomb to set for 30 minutes.
cc2fc6c1-bf9d-461d-8680-5580e6ba82df Once set, wrap the honeycomb loosely in parchment paper and use a rolling pin to break it into small pieces.
cc2fc6c1-bf9d-461d-8680-5580e6ba82df Scoop ice cream into two serving bowls and sprinkle with hokey pokey honeycomb. Serve immediately.
cc2fc6c1-bf9d-461d-8680-5580e6ba82df Enjoy!
9fb0670b-206d-4a58-9efd-0edf8bfb7ab4 Gather the ingredients.
9fb0670b-206d-4a58-9efd-0edf8bfb7ab4 Sterilize two 1-quart jars and lids by boiling in water for 2 minutes. Let air dry on a clean, lint-free dish towel and set aside until needed.
9fb0670b-206d-4a58-9efd-0edf8bfb7ab4 Use a small, sharp knife to cut a small X shape at the base of each peach. Place peaches in a large, deep heatproof bowl and cover with boiling water. Allow peaches to sit for 2 to 3 minutes.
9fb0670b-206d-4a58-9efd-0edf8bfb7ab4 Using tongs, transfer one peach to a plate. Try to peel the skin off. If it comes off easily, then drain and peel the remaining peaches. If not, let them sit in the boiling water for a further minute or so.
9fb0670b-206d-4a58-9efd-0edf8bfb7ab4 Peel the peaches and cut in half and remove the pits. Cut each half into 4 pieces, so each peach yields 8 slices.
9fb0670b-206d-4a58-9efd-0edf8bfb7ab4 Arrange peaches in layers in the jars alternating layers of caster sugar. Place half of a split vanilla bean down the side of each jar.
9fb0670b-206d-4a58-9efd-0edf8bfb7ab4 Pour over the brandy making sure the peaches are completely covered. Seal tightly then shake gently to help dissolve the sugar.
9fb0670b-206d-4a58-9efd-0edf8bfb7ab4 Place jars in a cool, dark place for 3 months. Make sure you shake the jar gently once a week.
9fb0670b-206d-4a58-9efd-0edf8bfb7ab4 After 3 months serve brandied peaches with pancakes, ice cream or enjoy with a dollop of clotted cream for dessert.
9fb0670b-206d-4a58-9efd-0edf8bfb7ab4 Enjoy!
cdfde129-e74e-40a2-9f44-39763dc81c8c Preheat the oven to 350 F.
cdfde129-e74e-40a2-9f44-39763dc81c8c Lightly grease a baking sheet and set aside.
cdfde129-e74e-40a2-9f44-39763dc81c8c Using an electric mixer, cream together the butter and sugar until pale and fluffyfor about 2 minutes. Add the egg and continue to mix until combined and smooth.
cdfde129-e74e-40a2-9f44-39763dc81c8c In a large bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Add about 1/2 cup of flour mixture to the butter mixture, stirring continuously with a wooden spoon until smooth. Add the remaining flour mixture and stir until smooth.
cdfde129-e74e-40a2-9f44-39763dc81c8c Add the ground almonds and vanilla essence and stir until combined.
cdfde129-e74e-40a2-9f44-39763dc81c8c Roll small balls of dough and place them on the baking sheet about 1 inch (2.5cm) apart.
cdfde129-e74e-40a2-9f44-39763dc81c8c Dip your thumb in some flour and then gently press down on the dough to make well in the middle of each cookie.
cdfde129-e74e-40a2-9f44-39763dc81c8c Spoon a small amount of jam into each well. Bake the cookies for 10 minutes or until they are a light golden color. Remove from oven and cool on a wire rack. Serve.
cdfde129-e74e-40a2-9f44-39763dc81c8c Store cookies in an airtight container for up to 2 weeks.
591bc825-e035-4767-94cb-5a452bf67410 Gather the ingredients.
591bc825-e035-4767-94cb-5a452bf67410 Place the milk in a small saucepan over medium-low heat. Add the vanilla extract and stir.
591bc825-e035-4767-94cb-5a452bf67410 Once the milk starts to steam, sprinkle in the rice and stir gently with a wooden spoon. Turn the heat up slightly and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
591bc825-e035-4767-94cb-5a452bf67410 Once the rice grains start to swell, place a lid on the pot and lower the heat. Keep an eye on the rice and stir occasionally for 5 to 7 minutes.
591bc825-e035-4767-94cb-5a452bf67410 Once the rice is cooked, remove the saucepan from heat and add the sugar, lemon zest, and a pinch of salt. Stir gently and taste. Add a little more sugar if necessary.
591bc825-e035-4767-94cb-5a452bf67410 Serve hot, at room temperature, or chilled. Sprinkle with cinnamon just before serving.
736033a6-2955-4215-9aab-5418ee49364e Gather the ingredients.
736033a6-2955-4215-9aab-5418ee49364e Heat the oven to 350 F. Line a baking tray with parchment paper and set aside.
736033a6-2955-4215-9aab-5418ee49364e In a small saucepan, melt 12 1/2 tablespoons butter over medium heat. Add 1 tablespoon golden syrup and 1 teaspoon baking soda to the butter and stir well. Remove from heat and set aside.
736033a6-2955-4215-9aab-5418ee49364e In a medium bowl, mix together 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 cup rolled oats, 1 cup sugar, 1 cup desiccated coconut and 1/4 teaspoon salt.
736033a6-2955-4215-9aab-5418ee49364e Add the melted butter-syrup-soda mixture to the dry ingredients and stir with a wooden spoon to combine ingredients.
736033a6-2955-4215-9aab-5418ee49364e Roll about 1 1/2 tablespoons of dough into small balls and flatten between the palms of your hands. Place dough on baking tray about 1.5 inches apart to allow room for spreading.
736033a6-2955-4215-9aab-5418ee49364e Bake the biscuits for about 10 to 12 minutes or until golden brown. Remove the biscuits from the oven and let them sit on the baking tray for 5 minutes.
736033a6-2955-4215-9aab-5418ee49364e Remove the biscuits from the tray and cool on a wire rack. Store cooled biscuits in an airtight container.
1d72ed52-7d9d-43c2-8bc8-93068c06755f Gather the ingredients.
1d72ed52-7d9d-43c2-8bc8-93068c06755f Preheat oven to 340 F/ 170 C.
1d72ed52-7d9d-43c2-8bc8-93068c06755f In a large sauté pan, fry the onions, garlic, and ginger in the butter until soft and golden brown.
1d72ed52-7d9d-43c2-8bc8-93068c06755f Add the spices, chutney, minced beef, vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, and stock cube.
1d72ed52-7d9d-43c2-8bc8-93068c06755f When the mince has browned, add the pre-soaked bread and work into the mixture.
1d72ed52-7d9d-43c2-8bc8-93068c06755f Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake, covered, in the oven for 40 minutes.
1d72ed52-7d9d-43c2-8bc8-93068c06755f Meanwhile, beat the egg, milk, and turmeric to make the savory custard mix.
1d72ed52-7d9d-43c2-8bc8-93068c06755f Add cream for an extra rich custard topping.
1d72ed52-7d9d-43c2-8bc8-93068c06755f Season with a little salt and pepper.
1d72ed52-7d9d-43c2-8bc8-93068c06755f Remove the mince mixture from the oven, uncover, then pour the egg mix over.
1d72ed52-7d9d-43c2-8bc8-93068c06755f Arrange the bay leaves on top then return to the oven for a further 15 minutes.
1d72ed52-7d9d-43c2-8bc8-93068c06755f The bay leaves should be fragrant and the surface of the custard, golden brown.
1d72ed52-7d9d-43c2-8bc8-93068c06755f Serve with rice and top with additional chutney, if desired.
1d72ed52-7d9d-43c2-8bc8-93068c06755f Enjoy!
5af17490-5c4c-4c15-81a2-79f419de9494 Gather the ingredients.
5af17490-5c4c-4c15-81a2-79f419de9494 Soak the dried apricots whole in just enough boiling water to cover them; allow to soak for about an hour. This allows them to rehydrate and become plump.
5af17490-5c4c-4c15-81a2-79f419de9494 Chop them into chunks, reserving the water to aid in dissolving the sugar.
5af17490-5c4c-4c15-81a2-79f419de9494 Blanch the peaches in boiling water and then place them into a pot of cold water in order to remove the skins.
5af17490-5c4c-4c15-81a2-79f419de9494 Chop into large chunks.
5af17490-5c4c-4c15-81a2-79f419de9494 Chop or dice the onions.
5af17490-5c4c-4c15-81a2-79f419de9494 Place all ingredients into a pot and heat gently for 20 minutes. (This action primarily allows the sugar to dissolve thoroughly.)
5af17490-5c4c-4c15-81a2-79f419de9494 Now allow the chutney to simmer at medium heat for about one hour without covering and stirring occasionally. Do not worry if the mixture still appears to be runny; it will thicken once cooled.
5af17490-5c4c-4c15-81a2-79f419de9494 Once ready, allow it to cool for 10 to 15 minutes prior to bottling into hot, sterilized jars.
5af17490-5c4c-4c15-81a2-79f419de9494 Keep sealed and allow to mature for two weeks to a month prior to consuming.
5af17490-5c4c-4c15-81a2-79f419de9494 Enjoy!
ee485af3-0991-4869-a358-7d81c7234d18 Gather the ingredients.
ee485af3-0991-4869-a358-7d81c7234d18 Place the fermented corn or millet dough into a medium pot.
ee485af3-0991-4869-a358-7d81c7234d18 Add 1 cup of cold water and crumble up the fermented dough to make a smooth paste. Place over high heat and bring to a simmer, stirring occasionally.
ee485af3-0991-4869-a358-7d81c7234d18 Add 2 cups of boiling water to the pot and bring to a boil, stirring continuously. At this point, the mixture may form lumps. Whisk lumps out to keep the porridge smooth.
ee485af3-0991-4869-a358-7d81c7234d18 Add a pinch of salt, the ground cloves, ginger, and chili powder. Stir and allow to simmer for 10 minutes over low heat.
ee485af3-0991-4869-a358-7d81c7234d18 When ready to serve, add the desired amount of sugar, stir and enjoy.
b80a82c6-b590-49c5-9b85-f79abaa959af Gather the ingredients.
b80a82c6-b590-49c5-9b85-f79abaa959af In a clean bowl, mix the flour, sugar, yeast, and salt (if using) together.
b80a82c6-b590-49c5-9b85-f79abaa959af Add the warm water and vegetable oil and begin to mix into a soft dough.
b80a82c6-b590-49c5-9b85-f79abaa959af Once the dough has been mixed very well, cover with a tea towel and set aside to rise for an hour. There's no need to knead the dough.
b80a82c6-b590-49c5-9b85-f79abaa959af After an hour, the dough should have doubled in size. Mix the dough againthis helps to achieve softer dough. After mixing, allow the dough to rest for a further 10 minutes.
b80a82c6-b590-49c5-9b85-f79abaa959af In the meantime, heat up enough vegetable oil in a pot for deep frying over medium heat.
b80a82c6-b590-49c5-9b85-f79abaa959af Scoop out some batter with a large spoon and drop it into the hot oil. Use a second spoon to push the dough into the hot oil if needed. Ensure the oil is being heated under a medium flame to prevent the magwinya from browning too quickly without fully cooking on the inside. Fry the doughnuts until golden brown, turning halfway to ensure even browning.
b80a82c6-b590-49c5-9b85-f79abaa959af Once ready, scoop the magwinya out of the pot and place onto absorbent kitchen paper to drain the excess oil.
b80a82c6-b590-49c5-9b85-f79abaa959af The magwinya can be served alone, but it also goes well with a cup of tea. For extra indulgence, roll it in jam and sugar. Serve immediately and enjoy!
df0217eb-625e-43f5-8849-3e355bef2547 Gather the ingredients.
df0217eb-625e-43f5-8849-3e355bef2547 In a heavy based pan, melt the butter in the vegetable oil, then add the spices to temper and become fragrant. Be careful not to sear or burn the spices, but allow the gentle heat to do its work for about a minute.
df0217eb-625e-43f5-8849-3e355bef2547 Add the onions, garlic and ginger and fry until softened. This should take about 3 minutes on a medium heat.
df0217eb-625e-43f5-8849-3e355bef2547 Turn the heat up to high and add the chicken pieces. Chicken on the bone such a thighs, drumsticks, or wings work best with this recipe as the bones enrich the flavor and the chicken remains moist. Allow the meat to brown and coat the pieces in the onions and spices very well.
df0217eb-625e-43f5-8849-3e355bef2547 After about 5 minutes, add the tomato puree and chopped tomatoes and give the pot a good stir.
df0217eb-625e-43f5-8849-3e355bef2547 Throw in the diced potatoes, rutabaga, chicken stock, and curry leaves. Check for seasoning as it may require a pinch or two of salt at this stage if necessary, then allow to simmer for about 30 minutes on a low to medium heat.
df0217eb-625e-43f5-8849-3e355bef2547 When ready, garnish with the fresh coriander leaves and serve on a bed of basmati rice and a sambal on the side.
232804ed-f11c-496d-b8c3-67c79b8a92e0 Gather the ingredients.
232804ed-f11c-496d-b8c3-67c79b8a92e0 Take 1 cup of cornmeal and add it to a pot. Add 1 cup of cold water to wet this and mix to create a paste.
232804ed-f11c-496d-b8c3-67c79b8a92e0 Add boiling water, then place the pot over high heat. The amount of water required will depend on the type and quality of cornmeal, but 3 to 4 cups is a good measure. Extra liquid can be added or cooked off as needed to achieve your ideal consistency.
232804ed-f11c-496d-b8c3-67c79b8a92e0 Bring the mixture to a boil and reduce to low heat to simmer for 15 minutes. You will notice it thickens rapidly.
232804ed-f11c-496d-b8c3-67c79b8a92e0 If it is too thick for your liking, add a few teaspoons of boiling water.
232804ed-f11c-496d-b8c3-67c79b8a92e0 Transfer cooked porridge to a bowl and mix in 1 to 2 tablespoons of peanut butter until well-incorporated.
232804ed-f11c-496d-b8c3-67c79b8a92e0 Add sugar to taste if desired, and enjoy with or without milk and sliced fruit.
b9bee720-d090-47e2-95b4-579db90e1551 Gather the ingredients.
b9bee720-d090-47e2-95b4-579db90e1551 Marinate the chicken pieces in the lemon juice.
b9bee720-d090-47e2-95b4-579db90e1551 Heat 2 tablespoons of niter kibbeh, ghee, or vegetable oil in a large, heavy-bottomed pot over medium-low heat, add the onions and cook gently for an hour until reduced into a sweet paste. Stir occasionally to prevent burning.
b9bee720-d090-47e2-95b4-579db90e1551 Add the remaining niter kibbeh, ghee, or vegetable oil. Add the berbere spice, followed by the ginger and garlic and fry until fragrant. More berbere spice can be added depending on how much heat is desired.
b9bee720-d090-47e2-95b4-579db90e1551 Add the chicken pieces to the pot along with the water or stock. Simmer on low heat for 40 minutes until the chicken is cooked. Halfway through, sprinkle the garam masala over the wat and continue cooking, stirring occasionally.
b9bee720-d090-47e2-95b4-579db90e1551 Add the boiled eggs to the wat and stir to coat completely. Serve the doro wat on top of injera to enjoy it the traditional way. Alternatively, this can be enjoyed with Indian flatbread or rice.
4ed379b0-c6bd-4e03-83e3-270f2564fecc Gather the ingredients.
4ed379b0-c6bd-4e03-83e3-270f2564fecc Soak the dried peaches and apricots whole in the vinegar overnight. This allows them to re-hydrate and become plump
4ed379b0-c6bd-4e03-83e3-270f2564fecc Blitz or chop them into small pieces with a food processor.
4ed379b0-c6bd-4e03-83e3-270f2564fecc Chop the onions in a food processor.
4ed379b0-c6bd-4e03-83e3-270f2564fecc Place all ingredients into a pot and heat gently for 20 minutes to allow the sugar to dissolve thoroughly.
4ed379b0-c6bd-4e03-83e3-270f2564fecc Allow to simmer at a medium heat for about 1 hour without covering, stirring occasionally.
4ed379b0-c6bd-4e03-83e3-270f2564fecc Once ready, allow sit to cool for 10 to 15 minutes prior to bottling into hot, sterilized jars.
45835afb-6d4d-47df-a905-b5ccdb5ed747 Gather the ingredients.
45835afb-6d4d-47df-a905-b5ccdb5ed747 The first step is to pre-soak the bambara nuts and peanuts separately in cold water, preferably for at least 12 hours or overnight.
45835afb-6d4d-47df-a905-b5ccdb5ed747 When ready to cook, drain the bambara nuts and top up with water and 1 teaspoon of salt. Bring this to a boil and simmer for 50 minutes.
45835afb-6d4d-47df-a905-b5ccdb5ed747 At this point, drain, then add the peanuts, remaining salt, and additional water to the bambara beans and boil for the remaining 1 hour and 10 minutes.
45835afb-6d4d-47df-a905-b5ccdb5ed747 After the cooking process is complete, taste for seasoning and ensure the peanuts and beans are cooked well.
45835afb-6d4d-47df-a905-b5ccdb5ed747 Enjoy as a snack or side dish.
1c8ad366-1b5d-4500-9bc0-f926631124c6 Gather the ingredients.
1c8ad366-1b5d-4500-9bc0-f926631124c6 Grate the coconut flesh from the shelled pieces using the large teeth of your grater, as larger shreds will contribute a chewy texture. Do this carefully, as the oil from the coconut may make your fingers slippery. Set aside.
1c8ad366-1b5d-4500-9bc0-f926631124c6 Make the caramel by dissolving the sugar in the water and lemon juice in a small pot over low heat, then bring to a boil.
1c8ad366-1b5d-4500-9bc0-f926631124c6 Allow the caramel to boil from 5 to 10 minutes without stirring, which will prevent granules from forming. Keep an eye on the mixture, as caramel can burn quickly.
1c8ad366-1b5d-4500-9bc0-f926631124c6 Once the caramel is deep brown, add the shredded coconut and cook for 10 more minutes, stirring occasionally. The coconut oils and natural moisture will release, and the mixture will become easier to handle.
1c8ad366-1b5d-4500-9bc0-f926631124c6 When the mixture has developed a toasty coconut aroma, remove from the heat and allow it to cool slightly.
1c8ad366-1b5d-4500-9bc0-f926631124c6 Grease a plate with butter or margarine.
1c8ad366-1b5d-4500-9bc0-f926631124c6 Handling the caramel with care, form balls with your hands, two spoons, or a small scoop. Place on the greased plate and allow to cool completely.
1c8ad366-1b5d-4500-9bc0-f926631124c6 Serve at room temperature (or microwave for 5-10 seconds to serve warm).
1c8ad366-1b5d-4500-9bc0-f926631124c6 Enjoy!
442182d0-a275-4134-9103-e9787d58895e Gather the ingredients.
442182d0-a275-4134-9103-e9787d58895e Heat the oil on medium heat in a large saucepan, and saute the onions until softened (about 5 minutes).
442182d0-a275-4134-9103-e9787d58895e Add the tomatoes, garlic, pepper, and ginger to the pot and stir. Allow to cook until the tomatoes reduce (about 15 minutes).
442182d0-a275-4134-9103-e9787d58895e Add the okra to the pot, followed by the prawns, squid, and fish. Add the stock and stir. Reduce the heat and allow to simmer for 5 to 10 minutes or until the okra is just tender, then remove from heat to prevent overcooking.
442182d0-a275-4134-9103-e9787d58895e Preheat the oven to 400 F. Place the lobster tails flesh side-up on a baking sheet and brush generously with butter.
442182d0-a275-4134-9103-e9787d58895e Bake for 12-15 minutes (depending on size), then remove from the oven, and brush with a little extra butter.
442182d0-a275-4134-9103-e9787d58895e Transfer the okra stew into a serving dish, garnish with the spring onions, then top with the lobster tails.
442182d0-a275-4134-9103-e9787d58895e Enjoy!
d1b3fcbd-c7b5-4aa4-846b-ad74aece15fd Gather the ingredients.
d1b3fcbd-c7b5-4aa4-846b-ad74aece15fd Finely chop the onions, crush the garlic and grate the fresh ginger. Place your pot on the stove top, add 1 to 2 tablespoons of palm oil into the pan and fry the onion, ginger, and garlic.
d1b3fcbd-c7b5-4aa4-846b-ad74aece15fd When the onions begin to brown, add the diced steak and allow to brown for only a couple of minutes.
d1b3fcbd-c7b5-4aa4-846b-ad74aece15fd Add the chopped tomatoes and scotch bonnet pepper. Scotch bonnet peppers can add quite a lot of spicy heat so if you wish to tone it down, add the pepper into the stew whole.
d1b3fcbd-c7b5-4aa4-846b-ad74aece15fd Mix half a cup of the agushie powder with water, enough to form a paste. Set aside for a few minutes.
d1b3fcbd-c7b5-4aa4-846b-ad74aece15fd After the tomatoes begin to break down, 5 to 7 minutes, pour in the agushie paste without stirring. Cover the stew and simmer on a low to medium heat for about 20 minutes.
d1b3fcbd-c7b5-4aa4-846b-ad74aece15fd For those who are adventurous and wish to use dried anchovies, soak them in warm water for about 10 minutes. Agitate the water, pour out and rinse the fish.
d1b3fcbd-c7b5-4aa4-846b-ad74aece15fd After 20 minutes, uncover the pot. You will notice that the agushie has cooked and created a solid cake similar to bean curd or tofu. You may now break this apart and stir into the stew.
d1b3fcbd-c7b5-4aa4-846b-ad74aece15fd Add the fish, followed by the spinach and allow to simmer for 10 minutes.
d1b3fcbd-c7b5-4aa4-846b-ad74aece15fd Check seasoning prior to serving. This dish can be enjoyed with rice or a more traditional side of boiled yams.
bfc84920-f2cc-4a76-aa8d-c9e075c427cf Gather the ingredients.
bfc84920-f2cc-4a76-aa8d-c9e075c427cf Bring the water to a simmer in a large pot, and add the spinach.
bfc84920-f2cc-4a76-aa8d-c9e075c427cf Once they have reduced in volume by about half, add the spring onions, garlic, and tomatoes and continue to simmer. Crumble the chicken stock cube into the pot and mix well.
bfc84920-f2cc-4a76-aa8d-c9e075c427cf Make sure all bones and skin have been removed from the smoked fish, then add them to the pot. Allow to simmer for 10 minutes.
bfc84920-f2cc-4a76-aa8d-c9e075c427cf Add 3 to 4 tablespoons of red palm oil into the pot.
bfc84920-f2cc-4a76-aa8d-c9e075c427cf Add the peanut butter and allow to melt over gentle heat. Stir it into the dish and allow to simmer for 10 minutes until ready to serve.
07509ecb-9c6a-4376-a3a1-d6e40de7047f Gather the ingredients.
07509ecb-9c6a-4376-a3a1-d6e40de7047f Prepare the beans by soaking and de-hulling two days in advance.
07509ecb-9c6a-4376-a3a1-d6e40de7047f Place the beans into a sturdy blender and begin to pulse until smooth. Add 1/4 cup of water at a time to facilitate the blending process.
07509ecb-9c6a-4376-a3a1-d6e40de7047f Add the onion, ginger, and scotch bonnet pepper to the blender.
07509ecb-9c6a-4376-a3a1-d6e40de7047f Pulse until smooth.
07509ecb-9c6a-4376-a3a1-d6e40de7047f Add the sea salt flakes and mix them into the batter.
07509ecb-9c6a-4376-a3a1-d6e40de7047f Heat up the cooking oil in a small to medium-sized saucepan.
07509ecb-9c6a-4376-a3a1-d6e40de7047f Test the readiness of the oil by adding a shaved piece of ginger. If it sizzles and rises to the top, the oil is hot enough.
07509ecb-9c6a-4376-a3a1-d6e40de7047f Using a tablespoon to scoop the batter, spoon about five tablespoons of batter into the oil. You will see them puff up into round balls.
07509ecb-9c6a-4376-a3a1-d6e40de7047f Allow to fry for three to four minutes. Turn them halfway through to ensure they are evenly browned.
07509ecb-9c6a-4376-a3a1-d6e40de7047f Once cooked, scoop them out of the oil using a slotted spoon or spider, and allow to drain on a paper towel.
07509ecb-9c6a-4376-a3a1-d6e40de7047f Serve as a snack with hot pepper sauce or tomato gravy. You can also enjoy them the traditional Hausa breakfast way, with porridge known as hausa koko.
07509ecb-9c6a-4376-a3a1-d6e40de7047f Enjoy!
40747ede-07f8-418f-a1ca-245a429ec692 Gather the ingredients.
40747ede-07f8-418f-a1ca-245a429ec692 Chop up all the ingredients into chunks. If using a pestle and mortar or asanka as your manual tool, then chopping them into small pieces will make it much easier to grind down into a sauce.
40747ede-07f8-418f-a1ca-245a429ec692 Place the ingredients into your blender (manual or electric) and grind until the ingredients are mixed will into a sauce. You will notice a few chunks of tomato or onion in the sauce. This is OK as it adds to the texture of the sauce.
40747ede-07f8-418f-a1ca-245a429ec692 Pour out into the serving bowl of your choice and enjoy with a can of sardines or corned beef and gari balls for a quick meal, or serve as a full meal with grilled tilapia and kenkey or banku.
7c7e4053-e8b5-47c4-bf43-846be320a088 Gather the ingredients.
7c7e4053-e8b5-47c4-bf43-846be320a088 Beat or whisk all the ingredients together in a bowl. Alternatively, mix them together with a hand-held blender.
7c7e4053-e8b5-47c4-bf43-846be320a088 Heat up a frying pan with enough butter or oil to lightly coat the surface.
7c7e4053-e8b5-47c4-bf43-846be320a088 Ladle some batter into the pan and swirl such that the batter distributes to make a thin layer which spreads towards the curving sides of the pan
7c7e4053-e8b5-47c4-bf43-846be320a088 Fry for about a minute or until lightly golden, then flip over and fry another minute or so on the other side.
7c7e4053-e8b5-47c4-bf43-846be320a088 Serve the malawah by spreading melted butter and honey on top or sprinkling some sugar on top.
5d5057b3-2d52-4106-a967-c1175162ec52 Gather the ingredients.
5d5057b3-2d52-4106-a967-c1175162ec52 Wash the rice and soak it in water until ready for use (at least 10 minutes).
5d5057b3-2d52-4106-a967-c1175162ec52 Fry the lamb for a few minutes until browned. Remove from the pot and set aside.
5d5057b3-2d52-4106-a967-c1175162ec52 Fry the onions until lightly caramelized, about 15 minutes.
5d5057b3-2d52-4106-a967-c1175162ec52 Meanwhile, grind the dry spices add to the onions, along with the garlic. Cook for a minute, until fragrant.
5d5057b3-2d52-4106-a967-c1175162ec52 Add the diced tomatoes and cook until they break down into a thick sauce.
5d5057b3-2d52-4106-a967-c1175162ec52 Add the lamb back to the pot.
5d5057b3-2d52-4106-a967-c1175162ec52 Drain the rice and add to the pot with the 2 1/2 cups water. Bring the rice to a simmer, then cover the pan with aluminum foil. Ensure the pan is well sealed.
5d5057b3-2d52-4106-a967-c1175162ec52 Simmer for about 15 minutes or until all the liquid has been absorbed.
5d5057b3-2d52-4106-a967-c1175162ec52 Fluff with a fork, and serve.
0a06f8ad-dceb-46a4-aff7-0f5da86d949b Gather the ingredients.
0a06f8ad-dceb-46a4-aff7-0f5da86d949b In a heavy pot, heat the butter or ghee over medium heat and fry the onions until golden.
0a06f8ad-dceb-46a4-aff7-0f5da86d949b Add the rice to the pot and stir until coated with the fat. Add the garlic and spices to the pot and and stir, allowing the spices to release their fragrance (about a minute).
0a06f8ad-dceb-46a4-aff7-0f5da86d949b Stir in the coconut milk and vegetable stock or water, and bring to a boil.
0a06f8ad-dceb-46a4-aff7-0f5da86d949b After 5 minutes, reduce the heat to low, cover firmly with a lid and allow the rice to cook for 15 minutes.
0a06f8ad-dceb-46a4-aff7-0f5da86d949b Fluff the rice and serve hot to accompany curries and stews.
